text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the answer to state that a GIP is generally governed by private law unless its constitutive convention specifies otherwise. In practice, its staff can be governed either by public law or private law, depending on: - the constitutive agreement / statutes of the GIP (convention constitutive)...' and later emphasizes checking 'What your \u201cconvention constitutive\u201d says'.
